GSD.description:
ntfs: fix out-of-bounds read in ntfs_attr_find()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.334 by commit 9fa645905c0457d69906eead302f70b1c7115538. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ntfs: fix out-of-bounds read in ntfs_attr_find()
